text: @KirstieMAllsopp @BBCNewsnight Reducing the argument to mortality makes it meaningless. Children can and do get very sick. Children carry infection to others. Adults work in schools... plus there's a huge unknown about the emergence of this newly-observed Kawasaki-type illness in children, linked to CoViD19.
